attributes.action: Save Hyde Clarendon College from demolition
attributes.additional_details: Hyde Clarendon College, once Hyde Grammar School, faces closure and demolition. Tameside Technology College which has owned Hyde Clarendon in recent years, plan to move resources to a new centre in Ashton and sell off the land. Hyde Clarendon College was built for the people of Hyde. It is a beautiful building and we do not want or need yet another housing development in Hyde. We want to keep our beautiful building, part of Hyde's heritage. It's time Hyde kept something and stopped losing it's precious resources to Ashton.
